Pre-Game Insights: Quentin Grimes has averaged 15.6 points, 5.7 rebounds and 4 assists in the seven games that Luka Doncic has missed.
Grimes has made 18 of 46 3-point attempts (39.1 percent) over the past seven games.
Luka Doncic is expected to return late this month at the earliest.
Irving has missed three straight games and four of the past five due to a slew of issues, including shoulder and back injuries and an illness.
He will not play on Thursday.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Mavericks are just 2-5 since Doncic went down.
The Mavericks beat the Trail Blazers twice before Portland bit back with a 126-122 victory on Dec. 28.
Robert Williams III made an impact (four points, six rebounds, four blocks) in 16 minutes of action after not playing in six of the previous seven games.
